feature_model.name: x264 Product Line

meta.data: Roberto Lopez-Herrejon based on N. Siegmund dissertation

feature_model.feature_tree: :r x264 (x264) :m no_asm (no_asm) :o no_8x8dct (no_8x8dct) :o no_cabac (no_cabac) :o no_deblock (no_deblock) :o rc_lookahead (rc_lookahead) :g [1,1] : rc_lookahead_20 (rc_lookahead_20) : rc_lookahead_40 (rc_lookahead_40) : rc_lookahead_60 (rc_lookahead_60) :o no_fast_pskip (no_fast_pskip) :o ref (ref) :g [1,1] : ref_one (ref_one) : ref_5 (ref_5) : ref_9 (ref_9) :o no_mixed_refs (no_mixed_refs) :o no_mbtree (no_mbtree) :o no_weightb (no_weightb)
